version_description:
- New, extremely challenging "20 Shades of Gray" world, designed by original Boulder Dash co-creator, Chris Gray
- More free Power-ups and Continues are given when you start a new game
- Gold bars for Continue are now 50% cheaper
- Updated character special abilities
- Able to unlock more free content sooner
- Enhanced 3D art and stunning visual effects
- Improved Game Center integration – Leaderboards and Achievements
- Performance optimizations and various bug fixes
- Special Christmas theme snowflakes in the menus

•Premium world with 20 all new, mind-bending levels, by original creator and video game legend, Peter Liepa!
•First four worlds have been completely updated to enhance playability!
•Improved special effects for all powerups!
•Limited time special events with unique prizes!
•Free Spins for prizes!
•Controller support now added for most iOS compatible devices.
•Compete with Facebook® friends to set high scores!
•Added Language Support for Polish and Russian!

v2.0
• 280+ Exciting Levels in 12+ New Worlds!
• First New Levels in 30 Years by Original Creator!
• Gem Combos and Stylized Power-Ups!
• Challenge Friends and Post High Scores!
• Unlock Characters with Unique Abilities!
• Weekly Events to Unlock Exclusive Content!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Various Bug Fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Various Bug Fixes
